pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods to predict the binding strength of peptides to major histocompatibility complex (MHC) molecules // Predicts binding of 9- to 12-mer peptides to MHC class I molecules using the stabilized matrix method. Can predict binding for several alleles from humans (HLA A/B), mice (H-2), chimpanzees (Patr A/B), and rhesus macaques (Mamu A/B).
